msg.msgText: To point to the Plug-in server which run outside of the IMA appliance, set "PluginDebugServer" configuration with the host IP address where the Plug-in server is running. To use the the Plug-in server in the IMA appliance, set the configuration to empty. By default, the PluginDebugServer configuration is not set. SYNTAX: imaserver set PluginDebugServer help imaserver set "PluginDebugServer=9.3.179.129" imaserver set "PluginDebugServer="

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
